short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Understand website user behaviour with dynamic click maps, visual form analysis and scrolling heatmaps.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Insightech Extension is a Chrome extension to apply Insightech features to your live websites to help you understand user behaviours and identify UX pain points.

Key Features:
- Dynamic Click Maps
- Dynamic Friction Maps
- Visual Form Analysis
- Scrolling Heatmaps
- Element Engagement Inspection Mode
- Segmentation

To learn more about the Insightech features, please visit https://www.insightech.com
